headline: GTA Online
subtitle: ASSAULT ON CAYO PERICO
content:
Calling all mercenaries. Do you have the hacking skills to infiltrate Cayo Perico and take down its defenses? Or do you have the strategic knowledge to keep your island HQ fortified against any attack?

Then kit out, load up, and prepare for the ultimate siege in an Adversary Mode like no other. Whichever side you’re on, one thing is clear: it’s going to be an all-out war. Assault on Cayo Perico is now available.
